Package othercontrollers

Class ProductCellController

java.lang.Object
othercontrollers.ProductCellController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ProductCellController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This Class is a Product Cell Controller for ProductCell.fxml,it runs all the methods that functions the choices of quantities or add to cart button for each product. for each product that is showing in the catalog page there is a product cell that have been created Note: this class uses help from Customer and Order class to set and get some functionalities
Author:
Mahran

      public void AddToCart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws Exception
